attributes.action: Scrap all plans and ideas to make all schools in England academies.
attributes.additional_details:
Every school to become an academy, ministers to announce
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-35814215
attributes.background:
The government plans to change all schools in to academies.
Mary Bousted,"It is hard to see how the government's plans will work when there aren't enough high quality multi-academy trusts to cope with thousands more schools and some trusts are performing as poorly as the worst local authorities
